about_the_game:
Earth is ruined by humans. The wealthy built a grand city, Highland, leaving the poor in Lowland to suffer exploitation.

You play Tamora, a young and vulnerable girl from the prosperous Highland. After losing her father in an accident, Tamora finds herself in a dangerous world. Once-familiar animals are now predatory; trees in forests have turned into sinister hunters, and even beloved pets like dogs and cats are now cruel foes. Tamora must dodge monsters and robots to reach home.



On her way home her quest will be reuniting with her father and finding her way back home. She'll experience the harsh life of the Lowlanders. You’ll grapple with notions of justice and equality while struggling to survive in the lowlands, teetering on the edge of extinction.

You play Tamora, a young and vulnerable girl from the prosperous Highland. After losing her father in an accident, Tamora finds herself in a dangerous world. Once-familiar animals are now predatory; trees in forests have turned into sinister hunters, and even beloved pets like dogs and cats are now cruel foes. Tamora must dodge monsters and robots to reach home.



On her way home her quest will be reuniting with her father and finding her way back home. She'll experience the harsh life of the Lowlanders. You’ll grapple with notions of justice and equality while struggling to survive in the lowlands, teetering on the edge of extinction.
legal_notice: The information and designs presented in this pitch are confidential and proprietary to WeeKen Studio, and any unauthorized use, disclosure, or distribution is strictly prohibited
name: Rust'N Ruin
short_description: Dive into 'Rust’N Ruin' an atmospheric 3D adventure in a post-apocalyptic steampunk world. Sneak and run through a world where all living creatures have turned against humans. Dodge monsters, and robots; find a way home. Be quick in danger and be clever with puzzles. Brace for boss epic battles.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support
